alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Watch issued January 28 at 1:27PM PST until January 30 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills possible. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...Northern Elko County, Southeastern Elko County, Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range, Southwest Elko County and South Central Elko County. * WHEN...From Sunday evening through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...If traveling or staying outside for extend periods of time, make sure to dress in layers and cover up exposed skin.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southwest Elko County
